bug.short_desc: Large tabs can land in the wrong group when dragged and dropped in Tab Panorama

assigned_to.name: Nobody; OK to take it and work on it

long_desc.thetext:
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.0; WOW64; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0 Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.0; WOW64; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0
Large tabs can land in the wrong group when dragged and dropped in Tab Panorama.
Reproducible: Always
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Create one large panorama group with a single tab in it. The tab will stretch to occupy the entire group. 2. Create two small groups, one above another, to the right of the large group. 3. Grab the large tab by the top left corner and try to drop it into the top small group.
Actual Results: Tab is dropped into the bottom group, or more generally, it appears to be dropped into whatever group was underneath the TAB CENTRE.
Expected Results: Tab is dropped into the top group, or more generally, whichever group is underneath the MOUSE CURSOR.

Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.2a1pre) Gecko/20110406 Firefox/4.2a1pre
Able to reproduce. Tab is dropped into the bottom group instead of the top group where the mouse cursor is place.
